CWEs: CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
description: The function getSizeFromRatio is vulnerable to code injection attacks. The function uses the math.eval function to evaluate a string provided in the options.ratio parameter. An attacker could provide a malicious string that includes JavaScript code, which would be executed when the math.eval function is called. This could lead to a variety of attacks, including data theft, data corruption, or denial of service.
